dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.assmt.RevenueAssuranceAssessment
dataStructure.description:
A measure of the effectiveness of RevenueAssuranceControls, RevenueAssuranceObjectives, and RevenueAssuranceKPIs. RevenueAssuranceAssessment include recommendations for refining RevenueAssuranceControls, RevenueAssuranceObjectives and RevenueAssuranceKPIs.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceAssessment

child.name: iD
child.description:
Unique identifier for the RevenueAssuranceAssessment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail the purpose of the RevenueAssuranceAssessment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: dateCreated
child.description:
The date on which the RevenueAssuranceAssessment was created.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dateCreated

child.name: dateStarted
child.description:
The date on which the RevenueAssuranceAssessement was started.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dateStarted

child.name: dateComplete
child.description:
The date on which the RevenueAssuranceAssessment was completed.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dateComplete

child.name: raAssessmentType
child.description:
A category that groups assessments that have strongly marked and readily defined similarities. For example, effectivness, trend analysis, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: raAssessmentType
